name: OMITE Demo
description:
Fly and run around, build your own paths, all with a simple goal: to find the Exit Cube and finally get out of this room...  Except, once you do, you are immediately teleported into another, simillar room.

FEATURES

  • Jetpack - Your jetpack lets you fly for a short distance, before you inevitably fall back on the ground
  • Building - You can use your Tool to create objects: Levitating platform, box (which you can grab and move around), and light bulb
  • Power - Creating platforms or light bulbs drains your power and the only way to replenish it is to complete the level
  • Random levels - Currently there are 4 room types, all of which are randomly generated

NOTES

  • This is my first game I've ever crated!
  • I used Unreal Engine 
  • For the soundtrack I used "Soundtrap Studio" app
  • I'm not really happy with the random level generator, so I'll be fixing it in future update
  • IT WAS UPLOADED 22nd FEBRUARY, IF THE PAGE SAYS ANYTHING DIFFERENT IT LIES!
